creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black; center 11" square has applique-like design with light blue petals over color patches with raised metallic centers; bordered by numerous bands of geometric cross stitch in pink, multicolor; black lining; open 4 1/2" loop at bottom
title: Baby Carrier
